mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_user_info (group_id, user_id) SELECT #{groupId}, u.id FROM user u WHERE u.email = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT gui.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickName, r.name AS roleName FROM group_user_info gui JOIN user u ON gui.user_id = u.id JOIN role r ON gui.role_id = r.role_id WHERE gui.group_id = #{groupId}
